document.full_text: nearly six years ago, "scream" horror director wes craven said he didn't think it wise to make a fourth movie in the blockbuster franchise because all the stories that could be told, had been.
document.title: "scream 4" aims to put film franchise back on track
lines_and_colors: nearly six years ago, "scream" horror director wes craven said he didn't think it wise to make a fourth movie in the blockbuster franchise because all the stories that could be told, had been.
